After the expiration: After the expiration of the active period, you can withdraw the collected part of your bonus.
Bonus accrual: Bonus accrual is available only after it has been withdrawn. When you withdraw a bonus, it immediately drops to your balance. The Bonus percentage increases with the userâ€™s Rank.
Collect: Collect your bonus in parts at a time interval in any of 6 currencies: BTC, TRX, ETH, USDT, BNB or BFG.
Desc: If you've reached Rank 5 and wagered a minimum of $1 000 in the past 7 days, you can activate your FuryCharge. The bonus amount is valid for the next 7 days from the date of its activation. The total bonus amount is distributed for the 7 days period in parts depending on the interval settings. New bonus accrual is available only after the previous one was withdrawn.
Each time: Each time you withdraw a bonus, you can choose a different currency. The shorter the period is, the higher is the bonus coefficient.
If you change: If you change the frequency of the bonus withdrawal (e.g. from 60 min to 24 hours), the already accrued amount will expire. Withdraw it before changing.
